name: Performapal Turn Toad
desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ] 
[ Monster Effect ] Once per turn, during your Battle Phase (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 monster you control; change its battle position, and if you do, switch its current ATK and DEF until the end of this turn.
pend_desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; switch its current ATK and DEF until the end of this turn.
monster_desc: Once per turn, during your Battle Phase (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 monster you control; change its battle position, and if you do, switch its current ATK and DEF until the end of this turn.
